name: Luke's Hunting Rifle (V)
Lore: 'Czerka 6-2Aug2. Extended barrel provides long-range targeting without expensive laser sight. Sturdy construction, but no match for a Tusken Raider''s gaderffi stick.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on Crell, Luke (of ability < 5), or Owen Lars. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny + X > defense value, target''s power = 0 (lost if a creature), where X = the number of your devices at same and related locations.',
